title: My Keyboard Was Hi Jacked!
description: Mammy is a writer who writes stories from The Heart of the BottomsUp 2/3 Acre. One morning she goes to her desk to write one of those stories. Can you imagine the horrific surprise she found waiting for her on top of her keyboard? Mammy's entire life came to a sudden nightmarish stop! What will she do? Who will help? This humorous story of an everyday fear will keep you laughing, cheering, then surprise you at the end.
author: Mammy Oaklee
